ygData.subject: Re: MORE Guild info
ygData.msgSnippet: Also it is listed in the terms of agreement somewhere that Hate Harassment is grounds for immediately being banned from the game.  I remember I noticed this
ygData.messageBody:
Also it is listed in the terms of agreement somewhere that "Hate Harassment" is
grounds for immediately being banned from the game. I remember I noticed this
because it listed harassment because of sexual orientation. Apparently that was
just Verant blowing smoke trying to make itself look good. Also when you make a
guild it is universal, that guide was on crack. Sorry but Im pissed, things like
this is what makes me wish we had an organization in our community comparable to
the Black Panthers, nuff said.

Tiger

David Lari wrote:

> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> Sandy,
> Whoever you spoke to at Verant cannot possibly know what they are talking
> about. When we got guild approval, after I wrote and then revised a charter, it
> was not based on any specific server. I know that the names of the guilds are
> universal, because otherwise, we could have used the "Unity" name that someone
> else had, unless we were on the same server.
>
> I have emailed verant last night and not received a reply yet. I will let
> everyone know when I do.
>
> If this matter is not resolved the way I think it should be, that will be the
> last straw for me and EQ will be uninstalled and I'll save $10 per month.
>
